info.heading: about
content: I'm an aspiring software engineer and scientific programmer with a life-long passion for art and astronomy! I've always held a fascination for the stars. Utilizing my skills in programming, I hope to one day contribute to the field of astronomy.

info.heading: Experience
content: Towson University graduate with a degree in Computer Science and a minor in Astronomy.
Space Astronomy Summer Program Intern at Space Telescope Science Institute in 2024. A recording of my presentation and research can be found here.
Astro Scholars program at Space Telescope Science Institute in 2022.
Worked as a teacher assistant for computer science and astronomy classes. I worked under Dr. Jennifer Scott, Dr. Miquel Angel Requena Torres, and Dr. Neda Saeedloei.
Dynamic Eclipse Broadcast team with various faculty and grad students at Towson University, where we took pictures of the April 8th 2024 total solar eclipse.
And more! Check out my LinkedIn and resume.
